markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bend Space](/Feats.aspx?ID=3980) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 45</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Transcendent Realization](/Feats.aspx?ID=3977)

</column>

---

Not even space itself is a match for the unleashed power of your mind. You can cast [_teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=338) as an innate occult spell. You don't need to touch creatures to target them with this innate spell as long as they're in range of your empathic sense.
name: Bend Space

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Bend Space Source Impossible Lands pg. 45 Prerequisites Transcendent Realization --- Not even space itself is a match for the unleashed power of your mind. You can cast teleport as an innate occult spell. You don't need to touch creatures to target them with this innate spell as long as they're in range of your empathic sense.
